pr_title: [ML] Audit updates on data frame analytics jobs

timeline.message:
[ML] Audit updates on data frame analytics jobs

Closes #59652

timeline.body:
A `Set` here seems like overkill. Just a `List` and `ArrayList` would do. 

But, that is not that big of a deal.
timeline.bodyText:
A Set here seems like overkill. Just a List and ArrayList would do.
But, that is not that big of a deal.
timeline.bodyHTML:
A Set here seems like overkill. Just a List and ArrayList would do.

But, that is not that big of a deal.
timeline.author: benwtrent

replies.bodyText: I'm using a TreeSet and thus I like it because we get the fields sorted no matter which way they are added in the future.
replies.author: dimitris-athanasiou

timeline.body: If `getUpdatedFields` returns `Set` then the matcher should be `containsInAnyOrder` so that it works regardless of the exact `Set` implementation.
timeline.bodyText: If getUpdatedFields returns Set then the matcher should be containsInAnyOrder so that it works regardless of the exact Set implementation.
timeline.bodyHTML: If getUpdatedFields returns Set then the matcher should be containsInAnyOrder so that it works regardless of the exact Set implementation.
timeline.author: przemekwitek

replies.bodyText: We want the test to fail if the set isn't sorted.
replies.author: dimitris-athanasiou
